short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the color of some hard-to-see Bedrock Vocabulary words to make them easier to see for people with color deficiencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use:

Start a Bedrock Vocabulary lesson then either Refresh the page OR Click the 'B' extension icon.
